name: WWE 2K20 Entrance Data File
summary: Learn about .EVD files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: In the WWE 2K video game series, wrestlers are shown making dramatic entrances into the wrestling ring. WWE 2K20 and later entries load the data used to play these entrances from EVD and .ACTS files.

instructions: EVD files are not meant to be opened. WWE 2K20 and later games in the WWE 2K series load and use EVD files during gameplay.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
